rows.label: tlk502101_msg0001
rows.name:
Meh!
Repairs of Goldmund very big job.

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, funny old boat. Fall apart, no
matter how much repairs...

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0003
rows.name:
Fall apart because of old. Not because
of Tondon!

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0004
rows.name:
But customer not believe Tondon...
Just sound like excuse.
Oh, work will never end!

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes, I'm sure it's hard work. But it's
very important!

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0008
rows.name:
I think your work with wood is really
something special. The love of the
material really comes through.

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0011
rows.name:
Thanks to happy feelings from Hotaru-chan,
Tondon feel much energy! Ready to
work again!

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0012
rows.name: Tondon make all vessels good as new!

rows.label: tlk502101_msg0013
rows.name:
Tondon would like to give Hotaru-chan
little token of thanks. Really is quite
little...
